name: tvo-politics-automation
description: Cypress automation suite for TVO Politics page testing

scripts.generate:report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome/*.json > cypress/reports/mochawesome/merged-report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/mochawesome --inline
scripts.test:with:report: npm run cy:run && npm run generate:report
